questions.question: Choose the function of carrier recovery block in QPSK receiver is

answers.c: to produce original, transmit carrier oscillator signal
answers.d: to produce high frequency out of phase signal

questions.explanation: Recovery of transmitted carrier signal at the receiver for coherent detection.

questions.question: Bit splitter in QPSK transmitter acts as
questions.explanation: The incoming sequence is converted to I channel & Q channel using bit splitter

questions.question: The number of outputs across Q-channel in 8-PSK transmitter is
questions.explanation: Possible outputs from Q channels are -1.301 V, -0.541V, +1.307V and +0.541 V for 01, 00,11 and 10 dibit inputs respectively.

questions.question: Pick the number of dots in the constellation diagram of QPSK modulation.
questions.explanation: Since it has 4 symbols each dot corresponds to 1 symbol.

questions.question: The bandwidth efficiency is also called as
questions.explanation: Bandwidth efficiency is also called information density or spectral efficiency which is a ratio of transmission bit rate to minimum required bandwidth.
